median.title: Median filter config for disparity post-processing
median.description: Set kernel size for disparity/depth median filtering, or disable

enableLeftRightCheck.title: Enable Left/Right check mode
enableLeftRightCheck.description: Computes disparities in both LR and RL directions, and combine them. For better occlusion handling

enableSubpixel.title: Enable sub-pixel mode
enableSubpixel.description: Computes disparity with sub-pixel interpolation (5 fractional bits), suitable for long range

enableExtendedDisparity.title: Enable extended disparity mode
enableExtendedDisparity.description: Disparity range increased from 96 to 192, combined from full resolution and downscaled images. Suitable for short range objects

rectifyMirrorFrame.title: Mirror rectified frames
rectifyMirrorFrame.description: Mirror rectified frames: true to have disparity/depth normal (non-mirrored)

rectifyEdgeFillColor.title: Rectified frames edge color
rectifyEdgeFillColor.description: Fill color for missing data at frame edges: grayscale 0..255, or -1 to replicate pixels

enableOutputRectified.title: Output rectified frames
enableOutputRectified.description: Enable outputting rectified frames. Optimizes computation on device side when disabled

enableOutputDepth.title: Output disparity instead of depth
enableOutputDepth.description: Enable outputting 'depth' stream (converted from disparity). In certain configurations, this will disable 'disparity' stream

width.title: Frame width
width.description: Input frame width. Optional (taken from MonoCamera nodes if they exist)

height.title: Frame height
height.description: Input frame height. Optional (taken from MonoCamera nodes if they exist)
